smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface WatchedShowDataStore is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface WatchedShowDao is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface WatchedEpisodeDao is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

The interface SeasonsView is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface TimeCalculatorView is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

Class YourLibraryActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

smells.name: MethodOverloading
smells.description: Methods which are overloaded often might be harder to maintain. Furthermore, these methods are tightly coupled. Refactor these methods and try to use optional parameters.

instances.message: This method is overloaded too many times.

smells.name: MemberNameEqualsClassName
smells.description: A member should not given the same name as its parent class or object.

instances.message: A member is named after the class. This might result in confusion. Either rename the member or change it to a constructor.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: pl.hypeapp.dataproviders.entity.api.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (page * size) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: page * size
Parentheses in (dynamicKey) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: dynamicKey

Parentheses in (ForeignKey(entity = WatchedSeasonEntity::class,
                    parentColumns = arrayOf("season_id"),
                    childColumns = arrayOf("season_id"),
                    onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ForeignKey(entity = WatchedSeasonEntity::class,
                    parentColumns = arrayOf("season_id"),
                    childColumns = arrayOf("season_id"),
                    onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)

Parentheses in (ForeignKey(entity = WatchedTvShowEntity::class,
                    parentColumns = arrayOf("tv_show_id"),
                    childColumns = arrayOf("tv_show_id"),
                    onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ForeignKey(entity = WatchedTvShowEntity::class,
                    parentColumns = arrayOf("tv_show_id"),
                    childColumns = arrayOf("tv_show_id"),
                    onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)
Parentheses in (WatchedEpisodeEntity::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: WatchedEpisodeEntity::class
Parentheses in (SeasonTrackerEntity::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: SeasonTrackerEntity::class
Parentheses in (EpisodeReminderEntity::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: EpisodeReminderEntity::class
Parentheses in (PremiereReminderEntity::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: PremiereReminderEntity::class
Parentheses in (WatchedTvShowEntity::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: WatchedTvShowEntity::class
Parentheses in (WatchedSeasonEntity::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: WatchedSeasonEntity::class

Parentheses around the lambda ({ palette ->
            colors = intArrayOf(
                    palette.getMutedColor(0x000000),
                    palette.getDominantColor(0x000000))
        }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses in (dependency?.y!!.toFloat() / dependency.height) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: dependency?.y!!.toFloat() / dependency.height
Parentheses around the lambda ({ presenter.onDrawerDrag(it) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses in (paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x
Parentheses in (paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x
Parentheses in (paddingBottom + getNavigationBarSize().y) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: paddingBottom + getNavigationBarSize().y
Parentheses around the lambda ({ presenter.onDrawerDrag(it) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses in (paddingEnd + activity!!.getNavigationBarSize().x) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: paddingEnd + activity!!.getNavigationBarSize().x
Parentheses in (paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x
Parentheses in (paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x
Parentheses in (defaultAngle / dependency.totalScrollRange * scrollPercentage) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: defaultAngle / dependency.totalScrollRange * scrollPercentage
Parentheses in (paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x
Parentheses around the lambda ({ onRetry() }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses in (paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: paddingEnd + getNavigationBarSize().x
Parentheses in (episodeOrderSum) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: episodeOrderSum
Parentheses in (selectedSum) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: selectedSum
Parentheses around the lambda ({ onRetryListener.onRetry() }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses in (totalItemCount - visibleItemCount) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: totalItemCount - visibleItemCount
Parentheses in (firstVisibleItem + visibleThreshold) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: firstVisibleItem + visibleThreshold
Parentheses in (AppComponent::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: AppComponent::class
Parentheses in (AppComponent::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: AppComponent::class
Parentheses in (it - TimeUnit.DAYS.toMinutes(days)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it - TimeUnit.DAYS.toMinutes(days)
Parentheses in (resources.getStatusBarHeight() + context.getActionBarSize()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: resources.getStatusBarHeight() + context.getActionBarSize()

Parentheses in (episodeModel.premiereDate != null && Calendar.getInstance().time.before(episodeModel.premiereDate)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: episodeModel.premiereDate != null && Calendar.getInstance().time.before(episodeModel.premiereDate)

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class LoadPageParams defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class PremiereDatesModel defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class Params defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: UntilInsteadOfRangeTo
smells.description: '..' call can be replaced with 'until'

'..' call can be replaced with 'until'

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of DecoratorLineDelegateAdapter.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of PremieresDelegateAdapter.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of MyGlideApp.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of DeleteSeasonTrackerUseCase.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function getSpanSize has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function isValidContextForGlide has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function getNavigationBarSize has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function createCompletable has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.description: Optional braces in when expression

Optional braces in when expression

smells.name: OptionalUnit
smells.description: Return type of 'Unit' is unnecessary and can be safely removed.

instances.message: The function hideSearch defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.
The function initPagerAdapter defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.
The function updateWatchState defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.
The function subscribeChangeWatchStateButton defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.
The function onToolbarHomeButtonClick defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.

smells.name: FunctionOnlyReturningConstant
smells.description: A function that only returns a constant is misleading. Consider declaring a constant instead

instances.message: hideOffscreenPages is returning a constant. Prefer declaring a constant instead.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'pl.hypeapp.episodie.R' is unused.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class TvShowExtendedModel contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called setSeasonWatchStateById
The data class TvShowExtendedModel contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called setEpisodeWatchStateById
The data class TvShowExtendedModel contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called applyProperWatchState

smells.description: `Unit` should be used instead of `Void`.
